# Test Secured Mobile Apps

In this section of the Appdome Knowledge Base, learn to Test Secured Mobile Apps built in Appdome's DevSecOps automation platform in your CI/CD. Automated mobile app testing suites are an invaluable part of any mobile DevOps pipeline. Review the Appdome features that support DEV, QA and UAT testing of secured mobile apps, including automation tools, guides and troubleshooting tips for testing secured mobile apps manually, on local devices, or in automated mobile app testing suites like BitBar, Sauce labs, Browserstack and other services commonly used by mobile developers in DevOps. If you don't find what you're looking for in this section of the knowledge base, enter your inquiry in the search field or contact support@appdome.com.
